note.p: Career: Royal Engineers (Bengal) (1849); First Lieutenant (1854); Captain (1858); posted to the Trigonometrical Survey, taking charge in Janin and Kashmir (1855-1864); posted to the Himalyan Survey in Kumaon and Gharwal (1867); Superintendent, great Trigonometrical Survey of India (1870-1873); Major (1872); Lieutenant Colonel (1874); retired as Colonel (1876)
